DOC.brief_summary: This study Phase 4 trial evaluates safety efficacy 2 % Lidocaine HCl different epinephrine concentration patient undergoing surgical extraction impact low third molar
DOC.brief_title: Trial Evaluate Efficacy Local Anesthesia Safety 2 % Lidocaine HCl With Different Epinephrine Concentration Patients Undergoing Surgical Extraction Impacted Lower Third Molars
DOC.criteria: Age 19 Physical grade 1 2 American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) Mesioangular horizontal angulation categorize winter classification Allergy hypersensitivity investigate product Any infection edema extraction The following patient : clot disorder , hyperthyroidism , arteriosclerosis , cardiac insufficiency , cardiovascular disorder Pregnancy breastfeed Any condition investigator considers appropriate study
